title: I cant update lol
body: When i update lol it says Update Failed Unspecified error ocurred.  Please check the logs for more information. I dont know what to do and I`ve tryed a lot of tuturials.                    Help Pls :D

replies.body:
This error typically happens after 33% during patching, so it's usually when the patcher is trying to connect to our patching servers. Work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
